guru: Guru is where real people talk about real food.
vibe: The right dish. The right vibe.
with_guru: Find the perfect spot for every mood — with GURU
born: Born in Saudi, but for food lovers!
moment: Help you discover the dishes & spots most loved by real, people for every mood and moment.
city: See what's trending in your city.
build: Build your flavor profile. Follow honest eaters
guru_social: GURU's social heart — where friends gather to share ratings,recommend top dishs and places worth experiencing.
we_dont_do_stars: We don't do stars, we do experiences
top_rated_desc: Dishes loved across Saudi — if it's on this list, it's worth the bite.
food_first_feed_desc: See what people are actually eating — not "ad-world" shots.
save_the_dish_desc: Not just the place. Save the exact dish you crave.
private_personal_desc: Your taste, your list. No one else can see it.
make_it_count_desc: One real review can help someone skip a bland bite — or find the best. So do it well!
get_in_touch_desc: We'd love to hear from you — drop us a message anytime
we_dont_do_stars_experiences: We don't do stars. We do experiences.
team_dines_anonymously: Our team always dines anonymously — no special treatment, no heads-up. Just like any other guest.
delicious_desc: Delivers strong quality and a standout element — whether in flavor, texture, or creativity. A solid pick that satisfies and impresses
good_desc: A decent and enjoyable dish. Nothing to complain about, but nothing too special either. May suit casual cravings or simple comfort.
okay_desc: Fell short in one or more areas — taste, texture, or balance. Not a recommended dish based on current feedback
gurus_choice_desc: Handpicked by GURU. These dishs earn high scores for taste, consistency, and crowd approval — a top dish to try
exceptional_desc: A rare and elevated bite. Memorable flavor, perfect execution, and attention to detail — a dish worth revisiting and recommending
exceptional_experience_desc: A rare and elevated experience. Flawless service, memorable atmosphere, and attention to every detail — worthy of a return visit and high praise
must_visit_desc: Delivers strong quality and a standout element — whether in food, hospitality, or ambiance. A solid recommendation for the right occasion
good_choice__desc: A decent and acceptable experience. Nothing major to complain about, but nothing particularly special either. May work for casual or convenient dining
okay_descc: Fell short in one or more key areas — consistency, service, or environment. Not a recommended experience based on current feedback
gurus_choice_descc: Guru’s Pick highlights top-rated restaurants recommended for their service, vibe, and consistent overall experience
how_meals_rated: How are meals rated on GURU?
how_meals_rated_answer: Each meal is scored by real users, and you'll see a quick "vibe" label. Each score, recommendation, or label is from someone who actually tried the dish—so you know what to expect before you order or visit.
can_anyone_create_meal_answer: Only restaurants can add new menu items, but users can easily rate through GURU. Be sure to update your app for the newest dish discoveries!
why_meals_show_okay_answer: That's honest, real user feedback. Not every dish is a hit. If it's not personal preference, it's a reflection of recent reviews.
what_does_gurus_choice_mean: What does "Guru's Choice" mean on a meal?
what_does_gurus_choice_mean_answer: It's the highest mark you can get—a dish that's consistently rated the best for taste, consistency, and crowd love. If you see this, it's a must-try!

label18: At Guru, your privacy matters to us. We are committed to protecting your personal data and being transparent about how we use it.
information_label: Account Information: When you sign up, we may collect your name, email, and basic profile details.
information_label1: Usage Data: We collect information on how you interact with the app (e.g., dishes you review, restaurants you visit, features you use).
information_label2: Device Data: Technical details such as your device type, operating system, and IP address.
use_information_label: To personalize your experience and show you relevant food recommendations.
use_information_label1: To ensure authenticity of reviews and prevent fake accounts.
use_information_label2: To communicate with you about updates, security, or support.
use_information_label3: To improve our app’s performance and add new features.
data_sharing_label: We do not sell your data.
data_sharing_label1: Your information may only be shared with trusted partners who help us operate the app (such as hosting or analytics providers).
data_sharing_label2: Reviews you post are public and visible to other users.
your_rights_label: You can access, update, or delete your account anytime.
your_rights_label1: You can opt-out of notifications or data usage for analytics.
your_rights_label2: You can request a copy of your personal data by contacting us.
security_label: We apply industry-standard measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, loss, or misuse. Changes to This Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any updates will be published on this page.
last: By using Guru, you agree to share only honest reviews and avoid offensive or misleading content. Your posts remain yours, but you allow us to display them in the app. Guru is provided “as is,” and we may update these terms occasionally.
our_team_dines_anonymously: Our team always dines anonymously — no special treatment, no heads-up. Just like any other guest.
faq_question_1: How are meals rated on GURU?
faq_answer_1: Each meal is scored by real users, and you'll see a quick "vibe" label. Each score, recommendation, or label is from someone who actually tried the dish—so you know what to expect before you order or visit.
faq_answer_2: Only restaurants can add new menu items, but users can easily rate through GURU. Be sure to update your app for the newest dish discoveries!
faq_answer_3: That's honest, real user feedback. Not every dish is a hit. If it's not personal preference, it's a reflection of recent reviews.
faq_question_4: What does "Guru's Choice" mean on a meal?
faq_answer_4: It's the highest mark you can get—a dish that's consistently rated the best for taste, consistency, and crowd love. If you see this, it's a must-try!
